fields.description: As discussion in YARN-998, we need to add rm.drainEvents() after rm.registerNode() or some of test could get failed intermittently. Also, we can consider to add rm.drainEvents() within rm.registerNode() that could be more convenient.
fields.summary: Fix some intermittent test failures in TestRMAdminService

comments.body: uploaded the patch as per comment ,even removed the unsused packages..kindly review.
Thanks [~brahmareddy] for taking on the patch which looks fine to me. Kick off Jenkins to see how test works.
